Bash(git merge origin/auth -m "Merge auth branch with full screen auth into main")
Bash(git checkout quote -- src/App.jsx src/components/SupaChatbot.jsx src/hooks/useAuthentication.js)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Get Quote feature and organize documentation

Features Added:
- Get Quote service selection page with 4 service options
- WhatsApp proposal delivery integration
- Multi-level phone number fallback system
- Responsive service selection UI with theme support

Code Changes:
- New ServiceSelection.jsx component for quote functionality
- Updated SupaChatbot.jsx to integrate quote page
- Enhanced App.jsx with phone persistence
- Modified useAuthentication.js for phone storage

Documentation:
- Moved all documentation to dedicated docs/ folder
- Created comprehensive GET_QUOTE_FEATURE.md guide
- Updated README.md with docs structure
- Added docs/README.md index for easy navigation
- Organized 11 documentation files

Cleanup:
- Removed .playwright-mcp folder
- Cleaned up root directory structure
- Updated project README with clear structure
